full_summary:
### Special Advisor Temporary Help Services RFP
#### Invitation to Tender
**Procurement Reference**: cb-943-73598844
**Publication Date**: 2024-04-17

The Government of Canada, through the Department of National Defense, invites qualified suppliers to submit proposals for Temporary Help Services (THS) under the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR). This requirement is open only to holders of Supply Arrangement EN578-172870 who have been qualified under Stream 13.9 - Special Advisor.

**Key Details**

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Notice Type**: RFP against Supply Arrangement
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* **Security Level**: Secret
* **Location**: National Capital Region (NCR)

**Supplier Information**

The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Akkodis Canada Inc.
* AZUR HUMAN RESOURCES LIMITED
* BP & M Government IM & IT Consulting Inc.
* Colliers Project Leaders Inc.
* DLS Technology Corporation
* Donna Cona Inc.
* Elevated Thinking Inc.
* Gomes Consulting Enterprises Ltd.
* IBISKA Telecom Inc.
* Lionel Drouin
* Malarsoft Technology Corporation
* Maverin Inc.
* RHEA INC.
* Tech4soft Inc.
* Turtle Island Staffing Inc.

**Request for Proposal Documents**

The Tender Notice and Request for Proposal documents are available for download at:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36222/s4791490--dp.pdf (French)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36222/s4791490--rfp.pdf (English)

**Tender Closing Date**: 2024-04-23T14:00:00
**Contact Information**

For more information, please contact CFSG(O-G) Temp Help at:
CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
(613) 971-7955

Note: The language of the original text has been rephrased and rewritten in a more professional manner to enhance readability and clarity. All the essential information has been retained, and the formatting has been adjusted for better presentation.  The rewritten text includes all the key details, supplier information
